response_parsed.title: Refactoring Event-Driven Systems Using FastAPI in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide demonstrates how to refactor event-driven systems by leveraging the FastAPI framework in Python 3.12+, improving efficiency and scalability.
key_points: FastAPI is a modern, high-performance web framework for building APIs with Python 3.12+
Event-driven systems can be refactored to use FastAPI by defining routes that handle events as requests
Asynchronous handling improves scalability and reduces resource usage in event-driven systems
FastAPI's flexible architecture allows for easy integration with existing components of the system
Middleware support in FastAPI offers additional capabilities to customize and extend functionality
